snippet.title: The Night Shift | Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Major update coming March 2024. Download The Night Shift, out now on Steam Early Access.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2468610/The_Night_Shift/

The Night Shift is a first-person horror game that brings the player into a world that progressively becomes a harrowing nightmare. No matter where you are in the store, your only means of defence is to run.

Follow The Night Shift on Social Media:
The Night Shift Twitter: https://twitter.com/redspiralstudio
